author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

At the moment, this PR is just meant to test #42711

It adds the PPS DAQ mapping to 13_3_X real data GTs. 
At the moment, no MC GTs are updated for it, because I have the impression that they are not actually needed because MC workflows do not consume the added payload (tests will tell).

Full description will be added if it will get finalized

#### PR validation:
title: [DO NOT MERGE] Add PPS DAQ mapping to 13_3_X real data GTs
